README.html.title: Numbers | LinksPlatform's Platform.Numbers Library
README.html.keywords: Numbers LinksPlatform's Platform.Numbers Class Library. Namespace: Platform.Numbers Forked from: Konard/LinksPlatform/Platform/Platform.Helpers/Numbers NuGet package: Platform.Numbers Documentation PDF file with code for e-readers. Depend on Platform.Converters Dependent libraries Platform.Unsafe Platform.Data Mystery files .travis.yml - Travis CI build configuration. docfx.json and toc.yml - DocFX build configuration. format-document.sh - script for formating tex file for generating PDF from it. format-csharp-files.py - script for formating single .cs file as a part of tex file. generate-pdf.sh - script that generates PDF with code for e-readers. publish-docs.sh - script that publishes generated documentation and PDF with code for e-readers to gh-pages branch. push-nuget.bat - Windows script for publishing current version of NuGet package.
